statements: SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, genre FROM films;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT id, title FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY title ASC, release_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM films WHERE genre IN ('Drama', 'Thriller') LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM films WHERE genre = 'Sci-Fi' OR genre = 'Fantasy' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE release_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT * FROM batch_updates WHERE updated_at >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY update_id ASC;
SELECT title, new_genre, updated_at FROM batch_updates ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT film_id, title, genre, release_date FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND release_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films WHERE genre IN ('Drama', 'Thriller') AND release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, title, genre FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM film_updates WHERE updated_at > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT batch_id, description FROM batch_updates WHERE executed = TRUE ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM films JOIN film_updates ON films.id = film_updates.film_id WHERE film_updates.new_genre != films.genre;
SELECT * FROM film_updates JOIN films ON films.id = film_updates.film_id WHERE films.genre = 'Drama' AND film_updates.updated_at > '2020-06-01';
SELECT title, genre FROM films;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT film_id, title, release_date FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT update_id, film_id, new_genre, timestamp FROM film_updates WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_id, batch_description FROM batch_updates ORDER BY update_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM films ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT film_id, genre FROM films WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_description FROM batch_updates WHERE update_count > 10 ORDER BY batch_id ASC;
SELECT batch_id, log_message FROM batch_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE genre='Horror';
SELECT * FROM batch_updates ORDER BY date_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT film_id, rating FROM film_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films WHERE genre='Action' ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films WHERE film_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND genre='Comedy' ORDER BY film_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM batch_updates WHERE date_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY update_id DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(film_id) as film_count FROM users JOIN film_ratings ON users.user_id = film_ratings.film_id GROUP BY username HAVING film_count > 5 ORDER BY film_count DESC;
SELECT films.film_id, films.title, genres.genre_name FROM films INNER JOIN genres ON films.genre = genres.genre_name WHERE genres.genre_name LIKE '%drama%' ORDER BY films.film_id ASC LIMIT 5;
